summary: Website project where a guard's availability status needs to be displayed as unavailable.

existing_features.title: On the public sign-up page (SignUpPage.tsx), mark the 'Guard' position as unavailable: disable the Guard option in the position selector, display a visible 'Not Available' label or badge next to it, and prevent users from submitting the form with Guard selected.
Update the HeroSection stats bar (HeroSection.tsx) to reflect that the Guard position is currently unavailable, so that the public-facing branding is consistent with the sign-up form restriction.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display guard as not available on the website
